name: willow blossoms
description:
willow blossoms is a highly personal project about endings and beginnings, about anxiety, about growing up, about living on the internet, about being a teenager, about living in isolation, and about friendship. 

though the game itself is complete, it will remain in beta stage until i finish combing through for typos, bugs, etc. if you discover any of these, please leave a comment so i can fix them asap!

meg <3
